data.name: Summoner's Tale
data.detailed_description:
Summoner’s Tale is an Action-Platformer monster collecting game in a new way!
Collect Monsters, discover their unique abilities, build your dream squad and fight your way to save the world!

A Demo Version Is Coming Soon!!!


A little boy Noe finds himself in a desperate situation in a big conflict with no one besides him, but as someone from the summoner’s family, he won’t be alone in his journey anymore, with the help of monsters Noe will seek the truth and choose between revenge and salvation which road he will take?!

Innovative View & Game play

Play in a normal platform camera or switch to our new third-person camera that will take your eyes!

Unique Monsters

 Each Monster has a unique ability!, Monsters are divided into four categories Companions, Special Attacks, Support, and Mobility
  • Companions will follow and fight beside you till their energy ends.
  • Special Attacks Monsters will appear and unleash their attack then disappear
  • Support Monsters will appear and activate their support skill then disappear
  • Mobility Monsters will give the player new way to travel across lands or help him in fighting with mobility moves and enhancements

Tame Monsters in different ways

Taming monsters is refreshing like never before some monsters will ask for battle, race, specific item, or special request!

Level up & Evolve

Battle and level up your monsters then evolve into higher more powerful forms!!

Build your dream team




Development updates are posted every 2-4 days on Twitter at @NegmWorld.

data.short_description: Summoner’s Tale is an Action-Platformer monster collecting game in a new way! Collect Monsters, discover their unique abilities, build your dream squad and fight your way to save the world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 3.20GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX 9.0c or better)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.20GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX 9.0c or better)
